Name: 03_HouseScouting
TextsDE: Das scheint das Esszimmer zu sein.
Das muss muss das Schlafzimmer von Kira sein.
TextsEN: Led by Ōishi, the Rōnin attack Kira's estate at dawn.
Some of the attacking Rōnin try to sneak through the gardens up to Kira's house.
They need to be careful not to alarm the guards and if need be to skilfully distract them.
